sellerCard.oneLiner: WordPress Website Developer and Technical SEO Specialist
sellerCard.description:
Hey, I’m Mahmood! I’m a WordPress Web Developer and WooCommerce e-commerce developer with over 8 years of experience. 

My Expertise:

➡️ E-commerce Website Development 
     ( Shopify | WordPress | 
     Woocommerce | Squarespace )

➡️ WordPress Website Development 

➡️ Business Website Development

➡️ Website Speed Optimization

➡️ Technical SEO 

➡️ HTML | CSS | Javascript | PHP.

➡️ Ahref | SEMrush | Moz | Google 
     Analytics | Google Search Console | 
     Google Tag Manager 

Hit me up!

description.content:
Are you looking for a modern, aesthetic, professional and responsive WordPress website design? Well, you are at the right place.


I will develop and design a WordPress website development for your business.


Types of Websites:

  • E-commerce online store with WordPress woocommerce and payments methods (Stripe, Apple Pay, PayPal, Credit card)
  • Business
  • Corporate Web
  • Non-profit and Funding
  • Portfolio Web
  • High converting Landing page
  • Mentoring and counselling
  • Real Estate
  • Car Agency
  • Dropshipping


I also offer:

  • WordPress on-page and off-page SEO
  • WordPress speed and performance optimization.
  • WordPress Bug and Issues fixing
  • WordPress complete redesign and revamp


What will you get:


  • Custom design with great attention to detail
  • Compatibility with all devices, browsers, and platforms
  • Fast-loading design for improved user experience
  • Great and modern design with customizations.
  • Search Engine Friendly URLs
  • Ongoing support and maintenance to keep your website up-to-date
  • All devices compatibility
  • Social media integration.
  • Elementor
  • SEO-friendly structure and content to improve your website's ranking on search engines
  • Search engine-friendly URLs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What materials you have to provide for me to start building a website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To start building a website, I'll need your company logo, written content, images, and any other data you want to include on your site. If you don't have content ready, I can use dummy content for the time being, and you can add the real content later.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is SEO and why is it important?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is the process of optimizing your website to improve its visibility on search engines like Google and Firefox. By using various techniques, such as keyword research, on-page optimization, and link building, SEO can increase your website's organic traffic.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is website optimization?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Website optimization refers to the process of optimizing your website for speed, performance, and search engine visibility. This can include tasks such as optimizing images, reducing page load times, and improving your site's SEO.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the importance of website speed optimization?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Website speed optimization is important because it directly impacts user experience and search engine rankings. A fast-loading website ensures that visitors can quickly access your content and navigate your website without experiencing frustrating delays.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What type of hosting is required for the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Hosting required for a website depend on its size, traffic, and functionality. Generally, shared hosting is suitable for small to medium-sized websites with low to moderate traffic. As a WordPress developer, I can help you determine the appropriate hosting type for your website based on your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate social media into my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, as a WordPress developer, I can integrate social media into your website. This includes adding social media icons and links to your website, embedding social media feeds on your website, and integrating social media sharing buttons on your website's content

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is a responsive website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A responsive website adapts to different screen sizes and devices, making it accessible to all users. It improves user experience, leading to better engagement and conversions. As a WordPress developer, I ensure that your website is responsive and optimized for all devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is domain and hosting of website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The domain is the name of your website, which represents your website on the live internet. Hosting is the server which hosts your website on the live internet. There are countless hosting provider companies to choose from.

milestones.title: Design Concept
milestones.description: I'll design a concept for your website.

reviews.comment: He continues to impress me. Excellent work Mahmood. He pays attention to detail and never lets me down.
He is the best and I will continue to use his services.

reviews.comment: Mahmood Saeed did an AMAZING job on our website development project. His ATTENTION to detail and CODE expertise truly exceeded expectations. With his deep understanding and quick delivery time, working with him was a breeze. Thanks, Mahmood, it was great working with you! 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the kind words, thomas. It was nice working on your project.

reviews.comment: He goes above and beyond with everything he does. I can't recommend his service enough. This won't be the last time I'll be using his services. He knows what he is doing and he is a professional. The work always gets done in a timely fashion. Thank you Mahmood you are the best 👍🏻
